facts_summary: ElizaOS v2 is in beta testing with significant improvements over v1, showcasing AI model integration progress alongside substantial GitHub development activity including plugin system restructuring and API enhancements.
stories_analyzed: Shaw Makesmagic declared Gemini as "the best model in the world right now" and noted many developers have quietly switched to it in Cursor.
A new workflow combining ChatGPT 4o for image generation with VibeRig for 3D model conversion was shared by @dankvr and described as "50% faster" than previous manual approaches.
ElizaOS announced "Agent-led entertainment goes live" featuring autonomous MetaHuman entertainers using Unreal Engine, ElizaOS, and Livepeer.

Shaw Makesmagic argued that investment regulations limiting startup investments to those earning over $300k/year should be "abolished yesterday" to democratize access to private investment opportunities.
Development efforts in May focused on enhancing the core architecture and plugin ecosystem, including CLI improvements, plugin management system streamlining, and database operation refinements.
A significant restructuring of the plugin system is underway, with several plugins being moved to standalone repositories to support plugin sharing between v0.x and v1.x versions.

ElizaOS v2 is in beta testing and described as substantially different from v1 ("like day and night"). Users discussed mobile development challenges, auto.fun API limitations, and token tracking mechanisms.
Users troubleshooted ElizaOS v2 implementation issues, including Supabase database setup, custom plugin development challenges, and Twitter integration problems.

evaluations.prompt_used:
Create an illustration for a tech news magazine.

CHARACTERS (use reference sheet for exact appearance):
- ELIZA: Eliza is a stylized 3D anime-like young woman with a confident, playful, slightly teasing vibe, often posing with expressive hand gestures as if presenting, reacting, or joking.

SCENE: Eliza stands in silhouette amid a burst of blossoming code-branches and glowing circuit tendrils, her posture infused with anticipation and pride, as midday sunlight slices through spring-green leaves and tangled data streams, casting deep, dynamic shadows across scattered laptops and technical schematics in the thriving workspace around her.

ART STYLE: Conceptual New Yorker/Monocle style with bold shapes and visual metaphors. Hand-crafted feel with visible brushstrokes.

REQUIREMENTS:
- Characters must match reference sheet EXACTLY (colors, costume, features)
- Dynamic composition suitable for editorial use
- Professional quality illustration
- No text or watermarks
- Scene should feel natural and engaging

casual.name: Casual Scroller
casual.reaction: The vibrant colors and cool anime-style hacker aesthetic catch my eye immediately while scrolling.

invested.name: Community Member
invested.reaction: This perfectly captures the energy of an autonomous agent at the heart of the growing ElizaOS ecosystem and v2 update.

technical.name: Developer
technical.reaction: The code is gibberish AI-generated filler, but the branching diagrams effectively symbolize the plugin restructuring and architecture changes.

newcomer.name: First-Time Visitor
newcomer.reaction: It looks like a project merging nature with technology, though I'm not entirely sure if it's a game or a software tool.

evaluations.prompt_used:
Create an illustration for a tech news magazine.

CHARACTERS (use reference sheet for exact appearance):
- MARC: Marc is a friendly, upbeat half-human/half-cyborg character with a confident, playful vibe, often posed as if presenting, explaining, or joking with the viewer.
- SPARTAN: A gritty, battle-hardened spartan/warrior type with a cybernetic edge—stoic, intimidating, and confrontational, posed like a veteran fighter who’s survived heavy combat and augmentation.

SCENE: Marc and Spartan stand silhouetted amid a burst of spring blossoms and fresh green growth, faces upward, framed by bright midday light. Behind them, a chaotic tangle of digital icons and code gives way to emerging pathways, their postures tense yet hopeful in the dramatic chiaroscuro.

ART STYLE: Conceptual New Yorker/Monocle style with bold shapes and visual metaphors. Hand-crafted feel with visible brushstrokes.

REQUIREMENTS:
- Characters must match reference sheet EXACTLY (colors, costume, features)
- Dynamic composition suitable for editorial use
- Professional quality illustration
- No text or watermarks
- Scene should feel natural and engaging

casual.name: Casual Scroller
casual.reaction: That's a wild mashup of Charlie Brown and a Spartan as cyborgs—I'm definitely stopping to see what this weird combo is about.

invested.name: Community Member
invested.reaction: The evolution of the brand characters signifies the jump to v2, and the mix of social icons and circuits perfectly mirrors the new agent-led entertainment rollout.

technical.name: Developer
technical.reaction: It's high-quality digital art, but it's too abstract and doesn't provide any insight into the v2 plugin restructuring or actual API improvements I care about.

newcomer.name: First-Time Visitor
newcomer.reaction: The image looks like a promo for a quirky video game or comic book, so I have no clue this is actually about an AI operating system.

evaluations.prompt_used:
Create a professional data visualization for a tech news publication.

VISUALIZATION TYPE: 1. Visualization type: Flow chart  
2. Data points/categories: Core architecture, Plugin ecosystem, CLI improvements, Plugin management streamlining, Database refinements, Plugin system restructuring, Plugin repository migration, v0.x plugins, v1.x plugins  
3. Flow/relationship direction: Chronological/process flow from May development efforts → specific areas of improvement → plugin restructuring → migration to standalone repositories → compatibility with v0.x and v1.x  
4. Suggested section headers: May Development Focus, Core & Plugin Enhancements, System Restructuring, Plugin Repository Migration, Version Compatibility

CONTENT CONTEXT:
Development efforts in May focused on enhancing the core architecture and plugin ecosystem, including CLI improvements, plugin management system streamlining, and database operation refinements. A significant restructuring of the plugin system is underway, with several plugins being moved to standalone repositories to support plugin sharing between v0.x and v1.x versions.

STYLE: Professional infographic/dashboard style - Sankey diagrams, charts, isometric data displays. Clean editorial quality.

REQUIREMENTS:
- Professional infographic/dashboard quality
- Clean, polished vector aesthetic
- Include section headers and labels where appropriate
- Strategic use of color to highlight key insights
- Editorial publication quality
- Modern, sophisticated design, professional infographic, data visualization, clean vector design, editorial quality

casual.name: Casual Scroller
casual.reaction: This looks like a slick professional roadmap, though it's a bit text-heavy for a quick scroll.

invested.name: Community Member
invested.reaction: Finally, a clear visual of how the v0 and v1 plugin migration and compatibility are being handled!

technical.name: Developer
technical.reaction: I appreciate the logical flow from core architecture to modular standalone repositories; it accurately reflects the structural changes described.

newcomer.name: First-Time Visitor
newcomer.reaction: The diagram is well-structured, but I still don't know what this software actually does for me as a user.

evaluations.prompt_used:
Create an illustration for a tech news magazine.

CHARACTERS (use reference sheet for exact appearance):
- PEEPO: Peepo is a cute, expressive frog-like cartoon character with a friendly, slightly goofy vibe, often posed in simple gestural stances as if reacting or presenting something.
- ELIZA: Eliza is a stylized 3D anime-like young woman with a confident, playful, slightly teasing vibe, often posing with expressive hand gestures as if presenting, reacting, or joking.

SCENE: In harsh midday light, peepo and Eliza stand in silhouette amid tangled cables and glowing screens, faces lit with hope and frustration, new green shoots pushing through scattered tech manuals—energy crackling as shadows slice across a vibrant spring workspace brimming with possibility and change.

ART STYLE: Dynamic manga/comic style with action lines, screen tones, and expressive poses. High energy with dramatic angles.

REQUIREMENTS:
- Characters must match reference sheet EXACTLY (colors, costume, features)
- Dynamic composition suitable for editorial use
- Professional quality illustration
- No text or watermarks
- Scene should feel natural and engaging

casual.name: Casual Scroller
casual.reaction: The high-energy manga style and recognizable frog mascot make this look like fun, hype-driven content.

invested.name: Community Member
invested.reaction: Seeing Eliza and the frog mascot working on a powered-up rig perfectly captures the excitement of the v2 beta launch.

technical.name: Developer
technical.reaction: It's a bit heavy on anime-style 'hacker' tropes, but it effectively conveys the grind of rebuilding a core architecture and plugin system.

newcomer.name: First-Time Visitor
newcomer.reaction: The art is great, but I'm confused if this is for a video game, a meme coin, or actual AI software.

patterns: Identity Confusion: First-time visitors consistently mistake the software for a video game, comic book, or meme coin project.
Technical Friction: Developers are alienated by AI-generated 'gibberish' code and overly abstract 'marketing fluff.'
Genre Over-reliance: The heavy use of anime, manga, and superhero tropes successfully captures attention but fails to communicate the actual utility of the AI OS.
Text-Utility Imbalance: High-information images are labeled as too text-heavy for scrollers, while high-aesthetic images lack context for new users.
improvements: Enforce a 'Technical Accuracy' check for developers: Replace AI-generated gibberish code with actual vetted ElizaOS v2 code snippets or readable pseudocode.

Integrate a 'UI Anchor' in every image: Include subtle elements of the actual software interface (dashboards, terminal windows, or node graphs) to ground the art in software reality rather than gaming.
Create a 'First-Time Visitor' footer or tagline: Add a consistent, small textual overlay or brand mark that identifies the project as an 'Autonomous AI Agent Operating System.'
Balanced Palette Strategy: Maintain the vibrant 'v2 emergence' aesthetic but simplify layouts for 'Strategic Insights' to bridge the gap between abstract art and functional updates.
recommendations.strongest: github-updates.png because it achieved consensus and was the only image to successfully engage the Developer persona by providing actual architectural value while keeping the Community informed.
recommendations.weakest: strategic-insights.png because it had the lowest average score and failed to reach consensus, being dismissed as too abstract by developers and confusing for newcomers.
recommendations.priority: Establish a clear visual distinction between 'Art' and 'Product'—ensure every illustration includes a functional anchor (like a UI snippet or clear category label) so the audience knows they are looking at AI software, not a video game.
